exhibitions.title: The Hermitage Encyclopaedia of Textiles.
exhibitions.location: The Main Museum Complex: St George and Picket Halls.
exhibitions.description: From 29 July, the exhibition “The Hermitage Encyclopaedia of Textiles. History” in the Winter Palace will be presenting for the first time the Hermitage’s textile collections in all their great variet.

exhibitions.title: Nefertari and the Valley of the Queens. From the Museo Egizio, Turin
exhibitions.location: The Main Museum Complex: St George and Picket Halls
exhibitions.description: From 16 June 2017, the Manege of the Small Hermitage will be the setting for the exhibition “Nefertari and the Valley of the Queens. From the Museo Egizio, Turin.

exhibitions.title: Anselm Kiefer, for Velimir Khlebnikov
exhibitions.location: Nicholas Hall of the Winter Palaces
exhibitions.description: On 30th May 2017, for the very first time in Russia, the State Hermitage Museum inaugurates a solo exhibition of one of the most famous contemporary artist, Anselm Kiefer.
